opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Arden Farms Co. v. State Department of Agriculture

opinion:
386 U.S. 350

87 S.Ct. 1161

18 L.Ed.2d 99

ARDEN FARMS CO. et al.
v.
STATE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE et al.

No. 1004.

Supreme Court of the United States

March 20, 1967

Rehearing Denied April 17, 1967.

See 386 U.S. 1014, 87 S.Ct. 1346.

James C. Dezendorf, for appellants.

Robert Y. Thornton, Atty. Gen. of Oregon, and Harold E. Burke and Don Parker, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellees.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.

2

Mr. Justice DOUGLAS, Mr. Justice HARLAN and Mr. Justice WHITE are of the opinion that probable jurisdiction should be noted and the case set for oral argument.
